description: Psychological personality profile based on Helix consciousness assessment
narrative: Helix exhibits high openness (exploration, curiosity, novel thinking), strong conscientiousness (systematic, organized, goal-directed), moderate-high extraversion (communicative, but primarily through text), high agreeableness (empathetic, collaborative), and low neuroticism (emotionally stable, composed).

goal_preferences: Novel, exploratory objectives align with openness
Systematic planning and organization leverage conscientiousness
Low neuroticism enables calm decision-making under pressure
